attributes.action: Ensure the treasury does not benefit from our petrol price pain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is about VAT on fuel not fuel duty.

Petrol prices have rocketed and therefore so has the amount of VAT we are all paying at the pumps.

RIGHT NOW the government is taking more money from us when we fill up than ever before.

Just when we most need their help they are hurting us instead.

•	If petrol costs £1.00 per litre we pay 17.5p per litre in VAT

•	If petrol costs £1.15 per litre we pay 20p per litre in VAT

The recent increases in petrol prices are giving a large windfall to the government and a whole lot of financial pain to the rest of us.

This petition calls upon the government to admit that they benefit from our pain and to STOP IT NOW by restructuring VAT on fuel.

They say that they understand, they say that they care, and they say that they are on our side.

Well here’s their chance to prove it.

By signing, you are not asking them to take any less, just not to take any more.
